Topic.Title: Stop Whining... Stop Complaining... Get back to Work...

Message.Msg: I might not have made myself clear, but I didn't literally suggest "lavish" spending, hence my quotes. Suffice it to say, IBM can afford meals, team building events, and occasional off sites. It doesn't have to be 1st class plane tickets & IBM can get excellent hotel deals. Moreover, not all 450,000 employees need this kind of spending. Development and sales do. Again, many companies with offices in Silicon Valley shell out the money to do so. SAP has a major office in Palo Alto, with free meals. You don't need rock bands, but you need compelling culture. IBM can figure it out. They did it once before. They can do it again. Something tells me they will need to.
